translations: v．供奉，珍藏：将某物或某人置于神圣的地位，以表示尊敬或纪念。
· The museum enshrines the works of the great artist.
博物馆供奉着这位伟大艺术家的作品。

sentences.sentence: Experts believe that the law enshrines effective measures.
sentences.translation: 专家认为，这项法律尊重有效的措施。

sentences.sentence: It also enshrines the germs of action, for good words almost always inspire to good works.
sentences.translation: 优美纯真的思想也蕴育着行动的胚芽，因为金玉良言几乎总会启发善行。

sentences.sentence: US law enshrines these state-sanctioned oligopolists’ status as “nationally recognised statistical rating organisations”.
sentences.translation: 美国法律将这些各州认可的评级巨头神化为“国家公认的统计评级组织”。
